Caustic band was an enchanted ring that granted the wearer the offensive power of acid.
Caustic band infused the wielders weapons or fists with magical acid â€“ this malefic excretion was released with each successful attack onto the targets. The rings central big green gem released a faint sound of sizzling when it was adjusted on the wearers finger.
In the , one such ring belonged to Derryth Bonecloak, a dwarvish potion maker who ran a shop in Baldurs Gate and collected fungi in the Underdark in the late 15 century DR.
